title: Would you pay $59 a year for overhead bin space? Delta is betting the answer is yes
text:
CLOSE

Would you be willing to pay to have a better shot at overhead bin space? Delta is offering that as a perk in a new subscription service to SkyMiles customers.

"Board sooner and find the perfect overhead bin space," reads a promotion for Delta's $59 annual SkyMiles Select plan, which buys you Main Cabin 1 boarding status.

While you would be among the first main cabin customers to board, Main Cabin 1 is actually the sixth group to enter the plane after pre-boarders, DeltaOne and Diamond Medallion members, first-class and Premium Select and then Delta Comfort+ customers.

Delta is offering SkyMiles Select members earlier access to the overhead bins for $59 a year. (Photo: Curtis Compton/AP)

Subscribers would become eligible 24 hours after enrolling.The subscription also comes with eight free drink vouchers per year. (Use them wisely!)

Early reactions are mixed but so far, it seems passengers are underwhelmed.

"Got an email today from @Delta asking if I wanted to pay $59 for a handful of drink vouchers and to sit in a small seat before everyone else," wrote @rewardscard. "No free checked bag or anything worthwhile."

Got an email today from @Delta asking if I wanted to pay $59 for a handful of drink vouchers and to sit in a small seat before everyone else. No free checked bag or anything worthwhile. #SkymilesSelect#Skymiles#WasteofMoneypic.twitter.com/r7AzneGfRl — PointsNerd✈️ (@rewardscards) October 16, 2019

@tjo4 found the offer enticing – but only useful to people who were planning multiple Delta flights in a year.

If I had more than one @Delta trip on the books, the #SkyMilesSelect subscription is a pretty 🔥 deal. — TJ O. ✈️ (@tjo4) October 16, 2019

@kurian_v lamented the increased importance of status: "#IMO other than for the 8 drinks - it's not worth it. Cabin 1 Boarding is actually the 6th Group to board - everyone's got a status these days!"

#Delta just announced $59 subscription service #SkyMilesSelect - you get Main Cabin 1 Boarding, 8 Drink Vouchers, Ltd Edition Bag Tag. #IMO other than for the 8 drinks - it's not worth it. Cabin 1 Boarding is actually the 6th Group to board - everyone's got a status these days! — Kurian Varughese (@kurian_v) October 17, 2019

Frequent flyer programs: Is it time to end these elitist systems?
